description:
Nishikata is at the mall to buy the latest volume of "100% Unrequited Love" when he runs into Takagi-san. 
She wants Nishikata to help her pick out a bathing suit, but Nishikata is too embarrassed to be seen with her. 
Suddenly, Nishikata hears a familiar voice...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shopping / Le maillot de bain / La mer / Ma chambre
買い物 / 水着 / 海 / 部屋
